title: Make information about application submissions consistent across the teams app
body_html:
This is supposed to fix #958 by:

  • distinguishing between submitted and in-progress applications on the project show page

  • updating the wording on the mentor's application index page (the table-caption)

Aside that it also includes a small drive-by-fix™ to display the right headlines for fields on the mentor application page if the application has the project as 2nd choice:

☝️ this previously always said (1st project)

Feature Specs
As I said in the previous dev-sync, I think feature specs with headless Chrome could make a nice addition to the app and help to make sure behavior does not break.
I for this PR added all the setup for headless Chrome and Capybara and implemented some tiny feature specs for the things I changed.

please note: ☝️ does of course not yet cover the behavior of the respective pages.
But I did not have more time and didn't want to make this PR even huger. I will add some follow up PRs with refactorings and feature specs - but I don't think I'll have any time until the weekend and did not want to leave this lying around until then 😉

Up for discussion:
I changed the configuration for the state machine column in the ApplicationDraft model, since I find it hinders test setups a bit... 🙈 I'm free for discussing this / changing this back though.
